price: Ní ti òdodo, dájúdájú ìwé iṣẹ́ àwọn ẹni rere wà nínú ‘illiyyūn.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
